useNavigate()	Muda de rota sem recarregar a página
Formulário	Coleta nome, CPF e endereço
*/import{useState,useContext}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{PedidoContext}from"../context/PedidoContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ClienteForm=()=>{const[form,setForm]=useState({nome:"",cpf:"",endereco:""});const{setCliente}=useContext(PedidoContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();// Impede o recarregamento da página
setCliente(form);// Salva os dados no contexto global

};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"cliente-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Seus Dados"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"nome",placeholder:"Nome",onChange:e=>setForm(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},form),{},{nome:e.target.value})),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"cpf",placeholder:"CPF",onChange:e=>setForm(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},form),{},{cpf:e.target.value})),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"endereco",placeholder:"Endere\xE7o",onChange:e=>setForm(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},form),{},{endereco:e.target.value})),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"primary-button",children:"Continuar"})]});};export default ClienteForm;
